## PopulatableEthersLiquity.redeemLUSD() method

Redeem LUSD to native currency (e.g. Ether) at face value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
redeemLUSD(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<PopulatedEthersRedemption>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of LUSD to be redeemed. |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedEthersRedemption](./lib-ethers.populatedethersredemption.md)<!-- -->&gt;
